Text: I made an account just to say thank you. I have been wanting this book for so long now. ^_^ And for everybody else wanting this book, this download works and doesn't require any password or anything like that.

Damn this is awesome. This is the real thing and by that I don't just mean a scan. This is the real fucking PDF. Amazing, i was so pissed at the fraudulent uploads but this makes up for all of this. Thanks ! I too made an account just to post this haha.
This is a genuine version, no passwords, no bulls**t too bad I just bought mine 5 days ago. :(
Wow, thanks. I have no idea how you put all that into a 63 MB PDF. That's amazing!
I also just made an account to say thank you. You're awesome! :D
I just logged in to say thanks, dude. Honestly, I wasn't expecting to find it at first and then I found this. So once again, thank you dude.
I bought this, but mainly as a collectors piece. I am glad someone uploaded a great digital copy. Thank you.
